org.codeavengers.main.service

Interface MapDataService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapDataServiceImpl

    public interface MapDataService
    Gateway to all the Map Data, this class is responsible for manipulation, retreival and removal. It allows access to the internal data through either LocationMaster or Category database entities. It however does not directly expose the data access layer entities but works with the REST wrappers instead.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    abhishek
    See Also:
    CategoryWrapper, LocationWrapper

    • Method Detail

      • getCategories

        java.util.List<CategoryWrapper> getCategories()
        Retrieves all Categories irrespective of any filters.
        Returns:
        a List of all CategoryWrapper
        Since:
        1.0

      • getCategory

        CategoryWrapper getCategory(java.lang.Long categoryId)
        Retrieves Category information by id. This method gives a more indepth data for the Category along with all the relationships defined.
        Parameters:
        categoryId - Category ID to be used for the retrieval
        Returns:
        an instance of CategoryWrapper reteived by id
        Since:
        1.0

      • addCategory

        CategoryWrapper addCategory(CategoryWrapper wrapper)
        This method allows adding a new Category or updating an existing one. This decision is taken based on whether the Category ID is a valid number.
        Parameters:
        wrapper - CategoryWrapper to be added as a Category
        Returns:
        Since:
        1.0

      • removeCategory

        CategoryWrapper removeCategory(java.lang.Long categoryId)
        This method deletes an existing Category from the database.
        Parameters:
        categoryId - Category ID to be used for the removal
        Returns:
        the deleted non-persitent instance of the Category
        Since:
        1.0

      • getLocations

        java.util.List<LocationWrapper> getLocations()
        Retrieves all LocationMasters irrespective of any filters.
        Returns:
        a List of all LocationWrapper
        Since:
        1.0

      • getLocation

        LocationWrapper getLocation(java.lang.Long locationId)
        Retrieves LocationMaster information by id. This method gives a more indepth data for the LocationMaster with all the relationships defined.
        Parameters:
        locationId - Location ID to be used for the retrieval
        Returns:
        an instance of LocationWrapper reteived by id
        Since:
        1.0

      • addLocation

        LocationWrapper addLocation(LocationWrapper wrapper)
        This method allows adding a new LocationMaster or updating an existing one. This decision is taken based on whether the Location ID is a valid number.
        Parameters:
        wrapper - LocationWrapper to be added as a LocationMaster
        Returns:
        Since:
        1.0

        Returns:
        the deleted non-persitent instance of the Category
